data.eml:eml: The false spider mites of the genera Aegyptobia Sayed and Phytoptipalpus Trägårdh (Acari: Tenuipalpidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khanjani, Masoumeh, Khanjani, Mohammad, Seeman, Owen D. (2012): The false spider mites of the genera Aegyptobia Sayed and Phytoptipalpus Trägårdh (Acari: Tenuipalpidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3295: 30-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213769
